Reviews.Title: “At excelent place close to every object of ancient city”
Reviews.Author: Egle_Lithuania_33
Reviews.Content: hotel confortable rome 20 min walking vatican 25 min closest metro station lepanto leaving pay 2 eur day voluntary city fee smokers smoke outdoors hotel breakfast included means poor continental mind im complaining location wonderful rest fakes food clothes shops

Reviews.Title: “A nice place to stay for a good price”
Reviews.Author: kyllikkielina
Reviews.Content: 8th time friends 39 persons spent time rome staying casa via alessandro farnese 18 prati enjoyed rich breakfast dinner 1930 oclock day staff friendly weve enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Excellent deal!!”
Reviews.Author: Paulandpetra
Reviews.Content: travel lot search found lovely hotel saint peter 5 minutes walk excellent position visit city center close metro receptionist helpful speak english german french neat clean

Reviews.Title: “Beware the "external rooms"”
Reviews.Author: leslie812
Reviews.Content: main hotel fine placed inthe admittedly inexpensive external dramatically main hotel shown web building minute window looks onto driveway filled cars surrounded solid fence floors aged linoleum theres carpet ants stay shower consists showerhead hung tiny bathroom drain barrier bathroom rest bathroom water floods floor theres soap shampoo using shower except top idea youll save money beware depressing stay main building

HotelInfo.Name: Casa Valdese
HotelInfo.Address: Via Alessandro Farnese 18, 00192 Rome, Italy
